text: Malvern is a town in Worcestershire, England. It is an old Victorian town which was built around its famous water. It has a population of 28,749. It is home to the famous Malvern Hills, and was the birthplace of the composer Sir Edward Elgar. == Other websites == *Malvern Gazette Local Malvern weekly newspaper *Malvern Hills District Council *Worcestershire County Council *Malvern Museum *Biking in Malvern *Malvern Linux Users Group *Malvern Fringe Festival Category:Towns in Worcestershire
title: Malvern, Worcestershire
